name: Calarts Customs (Early Preview)
description:
Use arrows to steer
and use 'E' for shop

This is just a prototype. Will be updated over time.

Current-Change-log:

Added brake-lines at certain speeds
Allowed car extra speed
Added Barriers
Added new light mechanics
Added street lamp posts
Added new tiles
Fixed old tiles
Optimized collision box on car

Previous-Change-log:
Added smoke particles
Changed grass physics
Change UI
Reworked graphics
Fixed issue with getting stuck in shop
